mechanics.condition: Target is a creature of your choice AND Target is visible AND Target is within spell range
mechanics.outcome: Target is eligible for the spell's effects

mechanics.trigger: Spell successfully targets an eligible creature
mechanics.condition: Target is NOT an Undead AND Target is NOT a Construct
mechanics.outcome: Target regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier

mechanics.condition: Target is an Undead OR Target is a Construct
mechanics.outcome: Spell has no effect on target

description_text: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.
